thread.title: R2i Hires Cara Caruso As VP Strategic Solutions Leader

author: cnbc.com
title: R2i Hires Cara Caruso As VP Strategic Solutions Leader
text:
BALTIMORE, Feb. 7, 2018 /PRNewswire/ -- R2i is an independent digital marketing agency that has expanded its leadership team with the addition of Cara Caruso as VP Strategic Solutions Leader. This is a new position for the agency which highlights R2i's commitment to advancing integrated solutions for the industries it serves. R2i is investing in deep industry knowledge to design digital solutions that accelerate digital maturity and drive value and impact for the agency's clients such as manufacturing, healthcare, and education brands.
Cara will lead strategic solution development leveraging R2i's core assets and capabilities with strategic marketing cloud platforms such as Adobe, Acquia, and Sitecore. In this role, she will guide innovation, design, and development of industry solutions that solve complex marketing challenges R2i's clients face today.
Cara has a long history of experience in sales and leadership with companies like Adobe, HP, Fox Filmed Entertainment, Statera, and most recently ICF Olson. She has a deep understanding of the digital media supply chain, technology solutions, and the enablement needed to deliver connected experiences across channels and media.
Jennifer Quinlan, R2i CEO, comments, "We are excited to have Cara on board leading this important strategic initiative in our growth strategy. Her background is the right combination of a data-driven, technology-focused approach to creating digital solutions that will solve for the challenges we see in the marketplace and that our clients are facing today. Cara's experience in advanced analytics and customer experience orchestration will ensure our solutions are developed with a keen eye toward driving measureable business outcomes for our clients."
"This role is an ideal fit for my personal mission to help clients drive growth and profitable revenue through the use of technology," shares Cara Caruso.
To learn more about R2i, visit http://www.r2integrated.com/ .

About R2integrated
R2i is a national full-service agency with offices in Silicon Valley, Seattle, New York, St. Louis, and Baltimore. With diverse expertise and a hands-on approach, R2i guides companies through a complex marketing landscape and builds integrated solutions that accelerate success. R2i's unique alignment between marketing technology, brand expression, and demand generation results in compelling creative campaigns, better user experiences, and deeper customer connections. Through focused areas of purpose such as web development and technology, multi-channel campaigns, media, loyalty and retention, brand strategy, and content marketing, R2i has consistently delivered on the new promise of marketing integration today for its clients. R2i clients include Microsoft, Chevron, Irvine Company, University of Michigan, American Cancer Society, Atlantic Health System, Pentair, and ServiceNow.
